Entities.Name: Drug
Entities.Definition: Names of medications as recorded in the clinical texts.

Entities.Name: Dosage
Entities.Definition: The specific amount of medication prescribed to a patient.

Entities.Name: Duration
Entities.Definition: The length of time the medication should be taken.

Entities.Name: Form
Entities.Definition: The form in which the medication is to be used, such as tablets, capsules, or injection.

Sample Data.Sentence: The medicine comes in the form of a liquid.

Entities.Name: Frequency
Entities.Definition: How often the medication is to be taken.

Entities.Name: Route
Entities.Definition: The method by which the medication is administered.

Entities.Name: Strength
Entities.Definition: The concentration of the medication dose.

Dataset.Name: MIMIC-III and n2c2 2018
Dataset.Details: Med7 model was trained using data from the MIMIC-III database and the n2c2 2018 challenge, which included detailed annotations of medication-related information.

Annotation Guidelines.Description: Annotations were performed by following official guidelines of the n2c2 2018 challenge, focusing on seven specific categories related to medication information.
